cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ReceiverID, CASE WHEN MaxSend >= COALESCE(MaxRead, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) THEN MaxSend ELSE MaxRead END AS LastNotificationChange FROM ( SELECT CN.ChatNotificationReceiverID AS ReceiverID, MAX(CN.ChatNotificationSendDateTime) AS MaxSend, MAX(ChatNotificationReadDateTime) AS MaxRead FROM Chat_Notification AS CN LEFT JOIN Chat_OnlineUser AS CON ON CN.ChatNotificationReceiverID = CON.ChatOnlineUserID WHERE CON.ChatOnlineUserSiteID = @SiteID AND CON.ChatOnlineUserJoinTime IS NOT NULL AND (CN.ChatNotificationSiteID IS NULL OR CN.ChatNotificationSiteID = @SiteID) -- filter by SiteID GROUP BY CN.ChatNotificationReceiverID ) AS t1
